advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes:
Enjoy a refreshed Trailer scrolling experience on the Explore tab, with numbered rankings in some areas and a brand new "Top Movies" section. Discover the most popular films of the century, watch their trailers, and see where you can watch them, all in one place.

Under Advanced Settings, adjust if the app opens to your Queue or to the Explore page to discover new trailers.

Indecisive people, rejoice! Watched something but not ready to leave a specific rating? Now you can just mark a title as "Watched" rating without any rating or sentiment attached.

Watched something a long time ago but rating it now? Choose "Edit Activity Date" to customize the exact date and even time that you watched something.
description:
Do you love watching movies and shows? You've come to the right place.

Queue is the easiest and most fun way to track your movies and shows, discover new things to watch, see where things are available to stream, and share what you're watching with your friends. Whether you're watching alone, with a friend, or planning movie night with someone special, let us be your ultimate companion to what you're watching. Queue is your guide to TV and movies, streaming and in theaters.

*See where anything is available to stream, no matter where you are in the world. Queue supports 100+ countries and 200+ streaming services
*Connect your streaming services and automatically pull in your full watch history and everything you're currently watching
*Watch trailers - explore a stream of trailers through the Explore tab to see what's new In Theaters, Coming Soon, Now Streaming, and more
*If you've been tracking on your phone what you want to watch, Copy and Paste your list from Notes, spreadsheet, anything, and in seconds it'll appear on your Queue. Upgrade your watchlist!
*Add the Friends Widget to your homescreen to see what your friends are watching. Works best when you both sync your streaming services!
*View all your upcoming premieres and episodes airings on one beautiful calendar view
*Create custom lists to show off your favorites or help keep your organized. You can even invite friends or partners to collaborate on your lists together!
*Swipe with a friend to help you agree on something to watch, or swipe alone build up your Queue
*Don't know what to watch? Use the Spinner to help you decide 
*Never miss a movie or series again with notifications to remind you when titles premiere and new seasons air
*Track your series - we have all the air dates for seasons and episodes to help you stay up to date 
*Unlock fun badges through different challenges in the app

Keep in mind we aren't a streaming service - you still need to have access to streaming services in order to watch the movies and shows you discover on Queue. But if you have streaming services like Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ and more, you'll love how Queue keeps your organized. Whether you watch on a phone, television, computer, or tablet, Queue is the best companion for watching. Become the most knowledge movie and show person in your friend group without leaving the sofa. 

We’d love to hear from you! We try to respond to all support emails as quickly as possible. Send your questions, feedback, or just say hi at info@queue.co. 

What’s in your Queue? 

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
